Description: This 2 bed 2.5 bath unit HAS IT ALL. Situated in one of East Boston's most desirable neighborhood- Jeffries Point, this renovated unit spans two floors, has open concept living, central air and hardwoods throughout. The kitchen is equipped with Samsung smart appliances, quartz countertops & backsplash. W/D in unit, Nest thermostat, smart key pad locks make living easy here! Both bedrooms upstairs have ensuite bathrooms and the primary bedroom features a walk in closet and deck. Approximately half a mile from the Maverick Train station, this home is situated on a dead end street with close proximity to the Jeffries Point yacht club, tennis & basketball courts on the waterfront that have the best city views of Boston! First security broker fee due at lease signing.
